Class EstimoteDeviceException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable

        • java.lang.RuntimeException

            • com.estimote.sdk.exception.EstimoteDeviceException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class EstimoteDeviceException
extends EstimoteException
    Wraps all exceptions that can happen when interacting with device.
